resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106766</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106766</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770203137</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Horrific Hurricanes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entsetzliche Hurrikane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ouragans Terrifiants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Furacões Horrific</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uragani Horrific</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φρικιαστικοί τυφώνες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Huracanes Horrific</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Despite gobs of data, it is still difficult to accurately predict the path and intensity of a hurricane. How are these predictions made? Are they getting more reliable? Will hurricanes be affected by global warming? And, while we're at it, what gets a hurricane turning in the first place?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trotz der gobs von Daten, ist es noch schwierig, 
den Pfad und die Intensität eines Hurrikans genau vorauszusagen. 
Wie werden diese Vorhersagen gebildet? Sind sie Erhalten 
zuverlässiger? Werden Hurrikane durch das globale Wärmen 
beeinflußt? Und, während wir an ihm sind, erhält was einen 
Hurrikan, der an erster Stelle sich dreht?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En dépit des gobs des données, il est encore 
difficile de prévoir exactement la voie d'accès et l'intensité d'un
ouragan. Comment ces prévisions sont-elles faites ? 
Sont-elles obtenir plus fiables ? Est-ce que des ouragans 
seront affectés par le chauffage global ? Et, alors que nous 
sommes à lui, qu'obtient un ouragan tournant en premier lieu ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apesar dos gobs dos dados, é ainda difícil 
predizer exatamente o trajeto e a intensidade de um furacão. 
Como estas predições são feitas? São começar mais de 
confiança? Os furacões serão afetados aquecer-se global? 
E, quando nós estivermos nele, que começa um furacão que gira
no primeiro lugar?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Malgrado i gobs dei dati, è ancora difficile da 
predire esattamente il percorso e l'intensità di un uragano. 
Come queste previsioni sono fatte? Sono ottenere più 
certe? Gli uragani saranno influenzati dal riscaldamento 
globale? E, mentre siamo esso, che cosa ottiene un uragano che 
gira in primo luogo?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρά τα gobs των στοιχείων, είναι ακόμα δύσκολο να
προβλεφθεί ακριβώς το μονοπάτι και η ένταση ενός τυφώνα. 
Πώς αυτές οι προβλέψεις γίνονται; Είναι να πάρουν 
περισσότεροι αξιόπιστος; Οι τυφώνες θα επηρεαστούν με την 
παγκόσμια αύξηση της θερμοκρασίας λόγω του φαινομένου του 
θερμοκηπίου; Και, ενώ είμαστε σε το, τι παίρνει έναν 
τυφώνα γυρίζοντας αρχικά;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">A pesar de gobs de datos, sigue siendo difícil 
predecir exactamente el camino y la intensidad de un huracán. 
¿Cómo se hacen estas predicciones? ¿Son el conseguir más
confiables? ¿Los huracanes serán afectados por calentarse 
global? ¿Y, mientras que estamos en él, qué consigue un 
huracán que da vuelta en el primer lugar?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DAVID TENENBAUM

VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770203137</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106766</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/horrific-hurricanes</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
